QuestData.Title: Among the Chosen
QuestData.Description:
Only one rune remains...
We should return to the House of the Chosen and report to Margrave Krexus. He will want to know of our progress.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to the House of the Chosen.
QuestData.RewardText: I will have my soldiers honor Krexus as he deserves.

Objectives.Objective: Return to the House of the Chosen
